action.description: The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Belatti, Morikawa, Shimizu, Souza; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Iwamoto;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Poepoe, Woodson.
